main event: A witness reported a UFO sighting of a dome-shaped object with a blue middle and white rims in Salem, Ohio, on March 13, 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as brighter than any fluorescent light., The witness spotted a reddish glow or circle behind a cloud previously., The witness had seen similar objects in the past., The police department did not receive additional reports of unusual sightings during this time., The object was observed for approximately six minutes.
sighted object: dome-shaped object with blue and white colors
witness description: 25-year-old male student with an interest in strange phenomena.
